details: Working on a project funded by the Danish Diabetes Academy. Doing research in diabetes epidemiology, specifically on identifying: the metabolic mediation between early childhood biomarkers and adult diabetes status; developing causal structure learning methods; and, creating a framework (as text and as software) for conducting reproducible and open scientific research.
